newsitem.title: UK: Avocet Mining places 3.2 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: Avocet Mining places 3.2 mln shares.

text.p: Britain's Avocet Mining Plc said on Friday it had allotted 3.2 million ordinary shares by way of a private placing at 165 pence per share.
The placing will raise approximately 5.4 million stg.
The funds raised will be used to repay certain loans and to provide working capital for the group.
Avocet said its working capital forecasts assume a rise in tungsten prices and a successful rescheduling of a number of its loan repayments, which is currently being pursued.
Failing either of these, a further fund raising exercise or alternative sources of working capital may be required, Avocet said.
